Parameters: Element: Element type for inputs and outputs
create(android.renderscript.RenderScript.Description: Create an intrinsic for applying a blur to an allocation. The default radius is 5.0. Supported elements types are @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_E@, @B_android#renderscript#Element#U8_4_E@.

Parameters: Allocation: Output allocation. Must match creation element type.

setInput(android.renderscript.Allocation.Description: Set the input of the blur. Must match the element type supplied during create.

Parameters: float: The radius of the blur

ClassDesc: Intrinsic Gausian blur filter. Applies a gaussian blur of the specified radius to all elements of an allocation. * @apiSince 17
